stepAnswer: The small container holds 20 gallons and the large container holds 30 gallons.
stepTitle: Two containers of gasoline hold a total of fifty gallons. The big container can hold ten gallons less than twice the small container. How many gallons does each container hold?
choices: The small container holds 20 gallons and the large container holds 30 gallons.

The small container holds 20 gallons and the large container holds 30 gallons.IThe small container holds 10 gallons and the large container holds 40 gallons.IThe small container holds 30 gallons and the large container holds 40 gallons.IThe small container holds 50 gallons and the large container holds 10 gallons.
